summary:
Medical doctor with a MPH degree and extensive work experience in General Practice, A&E and Medical Assistance (travel medicine). Working, studying and living in several countries showed me the many differences in healthcare settings and broadened my view overall. 

I would like to build on to these experiences, either on a national or international level and focus on medical or social topics, including their (financial) implications. 

After a world trip for four months I relocated from Bangkok to Amsterdam, but I am always open to opportunities elsewhere. I am fluent in Dutch (native), English and have learned some Portuguese and Spanish. I enjoy analysing problems and finding a pragmatic solution by working with and consulting others. 

Currently I am working at the National Health Care Institute as a medical expert and project leader.

Please contact me by email or LinkedIn for further information.
